entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
